KG''' (pronounced a-shampoo) is an international [[computer software]] company based in [[Oldenburg, Germany]]. They are best known for [[Ashampoo Burning Studio]] and [[Ashampoo WinOptimizer]]. They are general members of the [[Blu-ray Disc Association]]{{cite web |url=http://www.blu-raydisc.com/en/AboutBlu-ray/SupportingCompanies.aspx |title=Supporting Companies: |accessdate=5 July 2011}} and a member of the [[Intel Software Partner Program]]{{cite web |url=http://software.intel.com/partner/search-detail?companyguid=54d74ab5-12a3-e011-bcb3-0050568d2e6c |title=Partner Finder Detail - IntelÂ® Software Partner Program: |accessdate=5 July 2011}}. ==History== Ashampoo was founded in 1999 by Rolf Hilchner (CEO of Ashampoo). The company's name was formed during a discussion about their first product, an [[uninstaller]] [[utility software]], when Rolf Hilchner mentioned that ''"it cleans your Windows like a shampoo".''http://www.ashampoo.com/en/usd/pre/715/Ashampoo-Celebrates-10-years-of-Software-Innovation Their first published product was ''AudioCD MP3 Studio 2000''. They have since published software for [[office productivity software|office productivity]], [[security software|security]], [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring]], [[system utility]], multimedia, and [[CAD software|CAD]]. In 2007 they began producing several German [[web portal]]s starting with ''airshampoo.de''http://www.ashampoo.com/en/usd/pre/385/airshampoo-de-praesentiert-das-Lande-Gutscheinheft-2007-fuer-Piloten, and in 2008, ''netcar.de'', ''enimal.com'', and others. In 2011 they claimed to have over 14 million customers.{{cite web |url=https://www.ashampoo.com/en/usd/pre/1248/Ashampoo-starts-special-promotion-on-World-Environment-Day |title=AshampooÂ® starts special promotion on World Environment Day |author=Ashampoo Press |date=30 May 2011 |accessdate=5 July 2011}} ==Products== According to Ashampoo, their top-selling software, as of 2010, is: *Ashampoo Office (a re-branded "lite" version of [[SoftMaker|SoftMaker Office]]) *Ashampoo AntiSpyWare *Ashampoo FireWall PRO *Ashampoo Magical Security *[[Ashampoo Burning Studio]] *[[Ashampoo UnInstaller]] [[Uninstaller]] *Ashampoo Movie Shrink & Burn *Ashampoo HDD Control *Ashampoo WinOptimizer *Ashampoo Internet Accelerator *Ashampoo Core Tuner *Ashampoo Magical Defrag *Ashampoo PowerUp *Ashampoo Magical Optimizer *Ashampoo CoverStudio *Ashampoo Photo Commander *Ashampoo Snap *Ashampoo ClipFisher *Ashampoo Photo Optimizer *Ashampoo Music Studio *Ashampoo Media Player + *Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional ==References== ==External links== * [http://www.ashampoo.com/ Ashampoo Official Website] [[Category:Software companies of Germany]] [[de:Ashampoo]] [[es:Ashampoo]] [[nds:Ashampoo]] [[pl:Ashampoo]] [[ro:Ashampoo]] [[ru:Ashampoo]]
